prompt_base: cinematic photograph of a beautiful young scandinavian woman, piercing cold blue eyes, short blonde bob hair, blue denim jacket, striped sleeves
feature_prompt: scandinavian woman, blonde bob, denim jacket, striped sleeves, high detailed skin, 8k uhd, cinematic lighting, dslr, soft bokeh, hyper-realistic skin texture, visible fabric weave, detailed denim and knit textures, Fujifilm XT3 style
